emailMockbox

Mockbox is a simple, free in-browser SMTP server simulator.

Need to be sure that your automated emails are going out with the content you expect, but don't want to provide your personal SMTP credentials, or want a free alternative to Mailtrap? Use Mockbox.

Mockbox funnels emails straight from the SMTP interface to your browser - no sign up, no storage, no logins, no hassle. Quick, easy, and ephemeral. You can also use the Quick View.

Note that Mockbox is NOT a complete ephemeral mailbox. It is solely for the testing of SMTP clients that expect to speak to an SMTP server.

Get started!

①

Set your SMTP server to [server] on port [port]

②

Use any username and password (no encryption -- coming soon!)

③

Send an email to [email]assignment

④

Your email will appear below*, in real time!

* Emails will not be accessible, nor will you be able to recover or resume use of the address after you leave this page. Emails with total size > kB will not be displayed.

[email]assignmentat [server]:[port] (kB limit)
